		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[burst_total_pageviews_count]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[95]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How can I speak out without using social media?]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/advocacy-without-social-media/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 Jun 2024 08:04:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Vanessa_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=458</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">There are many ways to take a stand without posting on social media.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Participate in the BDS Movement: </strong>Involvement in the BDS movement is a powerful way of showing that you care about what is happening to Palestinians. Activism can take many forms, from on-ground protests to targeted boycotts. It is essential you find what works best for you and spend your time on the same.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color"><strong>What is the BDS Movement?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><a href="https://bdsmovement.net/what-is-bds">Boycott, Divestment, Sanctions </a>(BDS) is a Palestinian-led movement for freedom, justice and equality. BDS upholds the simple principle that Palestinians are entitled to the same rights as the rest of humanity and all of us can take personal action in solidarity with them.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Boycotts</strong> involve withdrawing support from Israel's apartheid regime, including its sporting, cultural and academic institutions.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Divestment</strong> <strong>campaigns</strong> urge universities and other institutions to withdraw investments from companies that are supporting the oppression of Palestinian people by the State of Israel.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Sanctions</strong> <strong>campaigns</strong> pressure governments to fulfill their legal obligations to end Israeli apartheid, and not aid or assist its maintenance.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color"><strong>Why is BDS important?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">The BDS movement focuses on the <strong>collective power of the people.</strong> Rooted in <strong>community mobilization</strong> it aims at putting <strong>pressure on people in power</strong> (both government officials and corporate executives) to help stop a genocide.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">BDS campaigns work across different fields (eg climate justice, armed conflict, Indigenous rights) &nbsp;to ensure all those involved are safe. These campaigns are by design, <a href="https://bdsmovement.net/news/statement-affiliation-bds-movement-and-use-bds-acronym">nonviolent</a> and <a href="https://bdsmovement.net/news/racism-and-racial-discrimination-are-antithesis-freedom-justice-equality">anti-racist</a>.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Why are we advocating for a ban on exporting weapons to Israel?</strong> A key focus for the BDS movement is a ban on exporting weapons to Israel: unless Israel faces consequences of its actions, it will not change its approach. The current attacks on civilian population are being done through these weapons under the guise of self defense. However <a href="https://www.msn.com/en-xl/asia/bangladesh/states-companies-must-end-arms-transfers-to-israel-immediately-or-risk-responsibility-for-hr-violations-un-experts/ar-BB1oAyJU">many experts</a> consider that these attacks are a gross violation of international humanitarian law. <a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/canadian-freeze-new-arms-export-permits-israel-stay-2024-03-20/">Canada</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href="https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/dutch-court-orders-halt-export-f-35-jet-parts-israel-2024-02-12/">the Netherlands</a> have halted arms shipments to Israel over concern they could be used in ways violating international humanitarian law. The U.S. has long been by far the&nbsp;<a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/what-military-support-does-us-provide-israel-2024-04-08/">largest arms supplier</a>&nbsp;to Israel, followed by Germany and Italy.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color"><strong>How can you help?</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Targeted Boycotts:</strong> Quakers in the USA have recently launched a <a href="https://afsc.org/companies-behind-2023-attack-gaza">website</a> to highlight the most important companies which are arming Israel and facilitating its genocide in Gaza. <a href="https://bdsmovement.net/BDS-Guide-Strategic-Campaigning">Focusing action on well chosen targets</a> is likely to be very important.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">Lobbying&nbsp; elected representatives to support the policies needed: Several <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/organisations-to-support/" data-type="post" data-id="456">organizations</a> provide clicktivism (aka internet activism) but it will be far more effective to do a <a href="https://x.com/fatimazsaid/status/1394650905933455365?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">personal email</a> or even more, see the official face to face. Its quite possible they wont agree with you given the views of many party leaders. But dont despair. If enough people show they really do care (ie take the time to write a personal&nbsp; letter or visit in person), then politicians will pass on this message to their leaders. This will happen in private&nbsp; but dont for a minute doubt that elected officials dont care about potential lost votes from people they hope will support them.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">Lobby the media for more balanced and more in-depth coverage: In most countries,<a href="https://theconversation.com/bias-hiding-in-plain-sight-decades-of-analyses-suggest-us-media-skews-anti-palestinian-216967"> media coverage has been biased against Palestinians</a> and often lacking in depth. You could get involved with organisations like <a href="https://www.britainpalestinemedia.com/">the British Palestine Media Centre</a> or if there is no such group in your country, you could&nbsp; join with concerned journalists and other like-minded citizens to fill this important gap in the campaigning ecosystem.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">Lobby your organisation, profession/<a href="https://notesfrombelow.org/article/solidarity-and-labour-organising-interview-workers">union</a> or <a href="https://www.latimes.com/delos/story/2023-11-22/cudahy-palestine-city-council-resolution">city counci</a>l to support resolutions and actions&nbsp; in solidarity with Palestinians. This could include <a href="https://www.thenation.com/article/society/new-england-journal-gaza-medical-establishment/">writing letters or articles in professional media</a> or <a href="https://belfastmedia.com/council-holds-special-meeting-and-passes-range-of-motions-supporting-palestine">speaking in favour of resolutions at key meetings</a>.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">Build <strong>people power through grassroots activism:</strong> Take part in/help organize sit-ins, vigils, marches, protest encampments, demonstrations, and other peaceful disruptions at weapon factories, military bases, complicit universities, arms fairs, and in front of relevant government buildings.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:group {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base-2"}}},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0","left":"var:preset|spacing|30","right":"var:preset|spacing|30"},"blockGap":"var:preset|spacing|20"}},"backgroundColor":"contrast","textColor":"base-2","layout":{"type":"constrained"},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<div class="wp-block-group has-base-2-color has-contrast-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color has-medium-font-size" style="padding-top:0;padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);padding-bottom:0;padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30)"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size"><em><br>Isabella Mascarenhas</em>&nbsp;is the CEO and Founder of The IM-Pact Kinship, a new social impact, youth engagement and anti-racism consultancy. She posted this advice originally on LinkedIn about how we can be active without using social media.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">&nbsp;Watching a genocide unfolding before our very eyes for the last 8 months has been utterly heartbreaking and unbelievably heavy. Close to 40,000 lives have been taken so far with approximately 40% of those being children. Children that look like mine, people who look like me. The targeted attack on Rafah last night was too much</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">There have been so many difficult, enlightening and necessary posts about this most recent war on Palestine. Some posters, in their hurt and frustration, have pointed fingers at those who remain silent on social media. This is a gentle reminder to everyone that there is life, and action, beyond social media and it is especially important to be kind at the moment when so many people are experiencing such pain, guilt and feelings of helplessness.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">I confess that I am one of those who may have appeared to be silent. Truth is, there are many reasons why people are afraid to speak up on social media. But there is so much that you can do outside of these platforms like:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">&nbsp;Attending protests and marches in person<br>&nbsp;Donating to charities, families and individuals in Palestine<br>&nbsp;Boycotting brands that are supporting these atrocities via apps like Belzemesh<br>&nbsp;Buying Palestinian brands such as Zaytoun<br>&nbsp;Educating others on the history and origins of this 76 year occupation or educating yourself if you dont know<br>&nbsp;Providing emotional support to activists and youth<br>&nbsp;Challenging shops and retailers who are still stocking Israeli products<br>&nbsp;Encouraging your employer to issue statements and resources to support the mental health of colleagues who may be struggling<br>&nbsp;Reaching out to our Muslim, and Jewish, siblings to offer solace and solidarity<br>&nbsp;Writing to your politicians to demand a ceasefire</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">I am all too aware that it can be seen as selfish but I too was scared about the repercussions of being vocal on social media because I, like so many, have a family to support and I relied on my salary for that. But you better believe my family and I have been doing almost ALL of the above on our own time. And now that I am on a short career break, I had to break my silence on here too</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">So please remember, not all action is visible on this little snippet of life we call social media&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">If you are silent on here and arent doing any of the above, its not too late to start. Be on the right side of history. Never again means never again for EVERYONE.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Do what you can and please be kindthe world needs more of that right now</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>#<a href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=freepalestine&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7200986039224598528">FreePalestine</a>&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","width":50} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-50"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/">Return to Take Action page</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2024-06-21 08:04:02]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-12 20:01:42]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-12 19:01:42]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[advocacy-without-social-media]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="take-action"><![CDATA[Take Action]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[4]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How can I have powerful, constructive conversations on this hard topic?]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/powerful-constructive-conversations/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 Jun 2024 08:11:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Vanessa_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=460</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Engaging in&nbsp; face to face conversations with trusted friends,&nbsp; family members, colleagues and members of our community is another powerful way to drive change.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">While social media and lobbying are crucial, in-person discussions when done in the right conditions, are more likely to inspire people to change their opinion and/or take action for the first time. This is because when people hear about issues from someone they trust, they are more likely to engage deeply and consider new perspectives. Furthermore, personal interactions can create ripple effects, spreading awareness , understanding and action further afield.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Creating the conditions for powerful and constructive conversations</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Here are some tips that can help, but remember, these conversations are difficult and may not always lead to immediate understanding or agreement. And thats ok.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Its important to choose carefully when, where and with whom to have these conversations. Sometimes, the best action is to step back if the other person is not ready for the discussion (or if you are feeling too heated).&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">With that and mind, here are some tips to help you prepare for your discussions:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Assess Readiness and Openness </strong>Consider whether the person seems open to a genuine dialogue. If they are highly defensive or dismissive, it may not be the right time to engage.&nbsp; Also consider whether you feel sufficiently calm, grounded and empathetic to engage in discussion.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Check Your Mental and Physical State:</strong> Be aware of your own emotions and physical responses. Ground yourself with deep breathing or a short walk if needed.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Manage Your Expectations </strong>Understand that changing personal beliefs takes time and is not always possible. Approach the conversation with patience, knowing that immediate agreement or understanding is unlikely.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Choose the Right Time and Place:</strong> Ensure a calm, stress-free environment like a quiet room or a park.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Build Trust and Mutual Understanding:</strong> Acknowledge the emotional complexity of the issue. Show genuine respect and interest in the other persons views.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Tune into Their Mood:</strong> Approach with empathy and listen actively. Share personal stories to create an emotional connection.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Provide Clear, Actionable Steps that they can choose from:</strong>&nbsp; Let them know about options available to them such as further education, joining advocacy groups, or making donations.Then let them decide what they would like to do. As humans we are more likely to act when we have decided to do so on our own terms.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>End on a Positive Note:</strong> Express gratitude for their engagement. If helpful: summarize key points and agreed actions. If helpful: invite them to continue the dialogue later, understanding change is gradual.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">By following these steps, you can create the conditions for more constructive conversations that encourage greater understanding and inspire meaningful action.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">If you want to go deeper into this topic here are some courses we recommend, to develop your ability to engage in difficult &amp; powerful conversations:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Hard Conversations Workshops by Jewish Voice for Peace. </strong>Unlock the power of meaningful dialogue with a workshop on having hard conversations. Join Esther Farmer and Asher Firestone&nbsp; in collaboration with @jewishvoiceforpeace, as they guide you through the art of powerful constructive conversations. Whether you're engaging with close friends, colleagues or family members these workshops provide&nbsp; tools and techniques to navigate conversations about Israel and Palestine&nbsp; with empathy and respect.&nbsp;<em>Sign up for monthly workshops at<a href="http://JVP.org/hardconvos." data-type="link" data-id="JVP.org/hardconvos."> JVP.org/hardconvos.</a></em><strong><em>&nbsp;</em></strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Study &amp; Action for Palestine by White Awake:</strong> White Awake is an organization dedicated to empowering individuals through anti-racist, anti-capitalist, anti-imperial, and anti-colonial education. While they specialize in working with white people, courses are open to all. <em>Late registration to&nbsp;Study &amp; Action for Palestineis open until June 30: <a href="https://mailchi.mp/whiteawake/palestine-solidarity-summer-2024-online-course.">https://mailchi.mp/whiteawake/palestine-solidarity-summer-2024-online-course.</a></em></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","width":50} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-50"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/">Return to Take Action page</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-12 19:51:26]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-12 18:51:26]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>

		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>

							<wp:postmeta>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[edgtf_hide_background_image_meta]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[no]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How can I take care of myself while watching this genocide unfold?]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/taking-care-of-myself/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 Jun 2024 08:09:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Vanessa_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=462</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Bearing witness to a crisis like the one were seeing in Gaza can seriously affect a persons mental health. Ongoing exposure to graphic images, painful first-person testimony and numbing statistics can lead to feelings of helplessness, depression and exhaustion. This section offers some advice on how to deal with those feelings.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem">Stop Policing your Rage: What does care look like?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Anger is typically characterized as a negative, destructive emotion. When we become angry over an injustice, we are often dismissed by others as irrational and counterproductive, whether or not our anger is proportionate or justified. This policing of rage can lead us to doubt ourselves: is our participation required?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">The answer is yes. Whether you choose to actively protest on the ground, participate in BDS (Boycott, Divestment, Sanctions) campaigns, or educate yourself on the genocide, your participation adds to the global movement.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Activism and care are not mutually exclusive. Your activism can co-exist with your need to draw boundaries and to prioritize your health and the health of your loved ones.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Another narrative common in activist circles is the idea that taking care of ourselves is somehow selfish. This couldnt be further from the truth. Locate care within your community, attend social functions, spend time with your family or chosen family, and allow yourself time to rest, recuperate and find joy.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem">Navigating Compassion Fatigue.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">If youre engaged long term in activism and your care is left unchecked, sooner or later you run the risk of compassion fatigue. Its important to recognize that many of us engaged in the movement also have our own mental health challenges and marginalized identities. Taking a step back to rest and recover is necessary to ensure that the collective trauma we are witnessing does not exacerbate our own struggles.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">(Extended Read: <a href="https://www.thehindu.com/society/navigating-compassion-fatigue-mental-health-emotional-burnout/article67512151.ece">Navigating compassion fatigue:&nbsp; Why its okay to self-soothe when a genocide needs our attention</a>)</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem">Despair is not Solidarity: Active Engagement vs Passive Consumption</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">In the age of social media, when you can follow a genocide unfolding as it happens, there is a high risk of isolation and despair where you find yourself incessantly scrolling through atrocities. That sense of helplessness keeps us disconnected from each other until, eventually, we find it hard to participate.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">So its important to understand how your consumption contributes to this helplessness.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Passive Consumption</strong>:<strong> </strong>There is a fine line between emotional processing, which moves us to action, compared to emotional venting across the internet, which normalizes despair. Passive consumption encourages us to consume death and destruction without a call to action. It perpetuates the belief that we must always be logged in, and that switching off your social media accounts is somehow looking away from the movement.<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Active Engagement: </strong>Part of activism is cultivating hope and practicing accountability. Active engagement calls for realistic methods of participation, which may include learning, online community organizing, and increasing visibility. While education and learning are powerful tools, there is often undue pressure to know it all. Caring for yourself means allowing yourself grace and time to learn.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote {"className":"is-style-default"} -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote is-style-default"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size"><em><em>Sometimes we can end up holding our potential back in the name of insecurity around not knowing enough Reject arbitrary standards of how super extra informed you must be before you take action in your community.&nbsp;</em></em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><cite>Palestinian Therapist Maria Fakhouri</cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem"><strong>Finding Joy: Activism is a continuous process</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote {"className":"is-style-default"} -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote is-style-default"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size"><em><em>I hope you are all taking care of yourselves. One lesson that I keep seeing in different forms, from our Black brothers and sisters, who faced and still continue to face unimaginable horrors (slavery, police brutality, unending racism), is that joy is an essential part of resistance.&nbsp;</em></em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><cite>Salman Naqvi, a Canadian pro Palestinian organizer</cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">While our social media feeds are flooded with death and destruction in Gaza, there are also many positive stories: students graduating from tents; children breaking Ramadan fast with their families; people singing songs and distributing sweets for Eid. Even within the Palestinian Diaspora, we see art as a method of resistance and celebration of culture.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">While activism can feel rooted in the present, it is a continuous process that spans weeks, months, years. Making time for joy is a way of fueling your activism in the long run.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size"><em>The Empire is selfish and wants us molded in its image: isolated, self-centered, miserly, harsh, violent, brutal. Refusing these ways of being is also resistance</em>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><cite>Prof Sunny Singh </cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Taking care of yourself can feel like an alien task as you watch a genocide unfold. However, your care is necessary to ensure that your engagement is active, meaningful, and rooted in community care.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","width":50} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-50"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/">Return to Take Action page</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-12 19:55:32]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-12 18:55:32]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[taking-care-of-myself]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="take-action"><![CDATA[Take Action]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_page_template]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_old_slug]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How can I engage in social media advocacy as safely as possible?]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/social-media-advocacy/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 Jun 2024 08:14:25 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Vanessa_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=466</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">There is an assumption that we all need to be posting and liking/resharing online. While social media is powerful, it may not be a match for everyone. If you do want to use social media, here are some tips for safer ways to engage.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":336,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","style":{"color":{"duotone":"unset"}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/BNM-Safe-Start-to-Advocacy-v2-724x1024.png" alt="" class="wp-image-336"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","width":50} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-50"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/">Return to Take Action page</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>466</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2024-06-21 09:14:25]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2024-06-21 08:14:25]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-12 19:58:20]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-12 18:58:20]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[social-media-advocacy]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="take-action"><![CDATA[Take Action]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[36]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[About Us]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/about/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 Jun 2024 14:53:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Vanessa_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?page_id=514</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:columns {"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10","left":"var:preset|spacing|50","right":"var:preset|spacing|50"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignfull" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50)"><!-- wp:column {"width":"100%","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|20","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|20"}}},"layout":{"type":"constrained","contentSize":"1000px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);flex-basis:100%"><!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"width":"66.6%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:66.6%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"1.4rem"},"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast"}}}},"textColor":"contrast"} -->
<p class="has-contrast-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.4rem"><strong>Bystanders No More</strong> is a multinational, unfunded, volunteer group of regular people - concerned citizens, parents, teachers, artists, business professionals - with a strong sense of right and wrong. We know that as silent bystanders start to speak up, it will become increasingly untenable for our governments to ignore or dismiss the will of the people.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"1.4rem"},"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast"}}}}} -->
<p class="has-link-color" style="font-size:1.4rem">We got started one step at a time. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"1.4rem"},"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast"}}}}} -->
<p class="has-link-color" style="font-size:1.4rem">We invite you to explore our path.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":"33.33%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:33.33%"><!-- wp:gallery {"linkTo":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-gallery has-nested-images columns-default is-cropped"><!-- wp:image {"id":19510,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","style":{"color":{"duotone":"unset"}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/22-Abby-Swain_NEVER-FORSAKE-YOUR-HUMANITY-1-685x1024.png" alt="" class="wp-image-19510"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></figure>
<!-- /wp:gallery --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:heading {"level":5,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"textTransform":"none"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1","fontSize":"medium","fontFamily":"body"} -->
<h5 class="wp-block-heading has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color has-body-font-family has-medium-font-size" style="text-transform:none"><strong>Step 1</strong></h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|vivid-red"}}},"typography":{"textTransform":"uppercase","fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"500","letterSpacing":"1px"}},"textColor":"vivid-red","fontSize":"x-large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-vivid-red-color has-text-color has-link-color has-x-large-font-size" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:1px;text-transform:uppercase">Listen.</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:separator {"align":"wide","backgroundColor":"contrast-2"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator alignwide has-text-color has-contrast-2-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-2-background-color has-background"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"18px"}}} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left" style="font-size:18px">A quick, anonymous (practitioner) survey helped us understand the most common reasons why some people who are supportive of human rights have chosen to take action for Palestinians whilst others have not. Responses guided us in supporting passive allies and open-minded neutrals who are silent but may be willing to break their silence.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:group {"metadata":{"name":"2 Learn"},"align":"wide","layout":{"type":"constrained","contentSize":"460px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide"><!-- wp:heading {"level":5,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1","fontFamily":"body"} -->
<h5 class="wp-block-heading has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color has-body-font-family"><strong>Step 2</strong></h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"textTransform":"uppercase","fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"500","letterSpacing":"1px"},"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|vivid-red"}}}},"textColor":"vivid-red","fontSize":"x-large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-vivid-red-color has-text-color has-link-color has-x-large-font-size" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:1px;text-transform:uppercase">Learn.</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:separator {"align":"wide","backgroundColor":"contrast-2","className":"is-style-default"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator alignwide has-text-color has-contrast-2-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-2-background-color has-background is-style-default"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"18px"}}} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left" style="font-size:18px">&nbsp;A mix of insightful information from credible sources is shared to motivate people to engage in a more meaningful way. Our emphasis is not on telling people what to say but rather providing information and choices beyond what the mainstream media tend to offer.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:group {"metadata":{"name":"3 Act"},"align":"wide","layout":{"type":"constrained","contentSize":"430px","justifyContent":"right"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide"><!-- wp:heading {"level":5,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1","fontFamily":"body"} -->
<h5 class="wp-block-heading has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color has-body-font-family"><strong>Step 3</strong></h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"textTransform":"uppercase","fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"500","letterSpacing":"1px"},"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|vivid-red"}}}},"textColor":"vivid-red","fontSize":"x-large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-vivid-red-color has-text-color has-link-color has-x-large-font-size" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:1px;text-transform:uppercase">Act.</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:separator {"align":"wide","backgroundColor":"contrast-2"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator alignwide has-text-color has-contrast-2-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-2-background-color has-background"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"18px"}}} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left" style="font-size:18px">A public stance is the goal, and it can be achieved in multiple ways. We hope to make it easier for regular people to lobby elected officials as well as speak with friends, family, and colleagues about humanitarian needs in Palestine - all of this is important, and none of it requires us to be experts or have all the answers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Bystanders No More </strong>prioritises the people we believe can be moved in the direction of taking action in support of justice - the compassionate but hesitant folks in the middle. We are not targeting leading opponents or leading activists, nor are we assuming a long-term role in this struggle. We encourage all who come in contact with this project to support existing groups doing important and ongoing work for human rights and humanitarian support in Palestine.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":19507,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none","style":{"color":{"duotone":"unset"}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/spectrum-of-allies-2.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-19507"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"center","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color"><strong>WHO WE ARE </strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Eller</strong>: British, PhD researcher, consultant &amp; social entrepreneur</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Ffiona</strong>: Welsh/Irish, organisational psychology &amp; social entrepreneur</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Gianna</strong>: USA, Leadership Coach &amp; Consultant, Equity Facilitator</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>James</strong>:&nbsp;USA, energy &amp; sustainability writer</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Jeremy</strong>: Australian, writer and media &amp; comms specialist</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Joe: </strong>Canada, strategy &amp; change management</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Melissa</strong>: USA/Mexico, renewable energy leader &amp; artist against apartheid</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Raj</strong>: British/Sri Lankan, retired medical doctor &amp; social entrepreneur</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Razya</strong>: British/Pakistani, researcher &amp; writer</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Sarah</strong>: USA, environmental justice researcher and consultant &amp; former university professor</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Parth</strong>: Indian, decolonial writer, researcher &amp; trauma therapist</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Pooja</strong>: Indian/Australian, ex-academic supporting equitable systems of research &amp; knowledge production</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Take Action]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/</link>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?page_id=414</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:group {"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0","left":"var:preset|spacing|20","right":"var:preset|spacing|20"}}},"layout":{"type":"constrained","contentSize":"","wideSize":""}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull" style="padding-top:0;padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-bottom:0;padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><!-- wp:group {"style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":"0px"}},"layout":{"type":"constrained","contentSize":"565px"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"1.25rem"} -->
<div style="height:1.25rem" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:quote {"textAlign":"center"} -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote has-text-align-center"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.3rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.3rem"><em>Once there is seeing, there must be acting. Otherwise, what's the use of seeing?</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><cite>- Thich Nhat Hahn<br><br>Thich Nhat Hahn was a Buddhist monk, internationally recognised peace activist, and was nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize by Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.</cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"1.25rem"} -->
<div style="height:1.25rem" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><em>Bystanders No More</em> exists to help you take actions that are true to <strong>who you are</strong>, and to help you consider whether who you are today (i.e. what you do and you dont do) is consistent with <strong>who you want to be</strong>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>We will not tell you what to do.</strong> Instead, we will show you some of the things that we, as former bystanders, are now doing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:separator {"className":"is-style-wide","style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"backgroundColor":"contrast-2"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-contrast-2-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-2-background-color has-background is-style-wide" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:group {"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"},"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10","left":"var:preset|spacing|10","right":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"backgroundColor":"base-2","layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-base-2-background-color has-background" style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)"><!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">There are several paths to taking action and they all connect. Questions to consider:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul class="wp-block-list"><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">What <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/what-policies-could-i-lobby-for/" data-type="link" data-id="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/what-policies-could-i-lobby-for/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><strong>policies</strong></a> could I back?</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">How can I <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-lobby-elected-representatives/"><strong>lobby elected representatives</strong></a>?</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">Which <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/which-organisations-could-i-support/" data-type="link" data-id="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/which-organisations-could-i-support/"><strong>organisations</strong></a></span> could I support?</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">How can I speak up <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-do-advocacy-without-using-social-media/" data-type="link" data-id="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-do-advocacy-without-using-social-media/"><strong>without using social media</strong></a></span>?</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">How can I have <strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-have-powerful-constructive-conversations-on-this-hard-topic/" data-type="link" data-id="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-have-powerful-constructive-conversations-on-this-hard-topic/">powerful, constructive conversations</a></span> </strong>on this sensitive topic?</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">How can I engage in <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-do-social-media-advocacy-as-safely-as-possible/" data-type="link" data-id="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-do-social-media-advocacy-as-safely-as-possible/"><strong>social media advocacy</strong></a></span> as safely as possible?</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size">How can I <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-take-care-of-myself-whilst-watching-this-genocide-unfold/" data-type="link" data-id="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-take-care-of-myself-whilst-watching-this-genocide-unfold/"><strong>take care of myself </strong></a></span>whilst I watch atrocities unfold in real time?</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">All these activities are important, but we also need to start somewhere  becoming an empowered change-maker is a process, not an on/off switch! It may be best to build initial momentum with the topic that you feel most confident about: what more can you do in that space? To support your growth, pick the topic where you feel least confident: what is one small thing you can do today that will move you forward?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:shortcode -->
[rt-testimonial id="19956" title="3 Testimonials"]
<!-- /wp:shortcode -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul class="wp-block-list"><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/BNM-Take-Action_French-Translation-v3.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">French (Franais) translation</a></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Donate and sponser to poor people]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/charity/donate-and-sponser-to-poor-people/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 07 Apr 2021 11:34:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Vanessa_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost/gutenbergdev/?p=193</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Senectus molestie ad gravida tempor est sapiente ullamco accumsan pede dolores commodo habitant debitis, quis. Facilisis dictum hic ornare repellat! Harum maxime cum. Eros, dicta eros! Pharetra posuere adipisicing bibendum quia porta eius etiam mollit ea ligula ipsa, porttitor! Elementum sollicitudin, eleifend laudantium pariatur? Sunt necessitatibus, excepteur aut do facilis, scelerisque! Voluptatem praesent, diam eligendi unde! Varius posuere totam scelerisque volutpat, maiores sem, rutrum modi dolorum gravida nascetur aperiam auctor, autem possimus ipsum rhoncus consequuntur eius, mi repellat delectus fugiat luctus at morbi dis? Nascetur inventore asperiores nascetur, autem curabitur, assumenda, ullamco sequi asperiores pulvinar egestas magni feugiat cum facilisi.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Resources]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/resources/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 27 Jun 2024 08:07:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[a56dfb_C0l8y]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?page_id=19530</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color"><em>"To be a Jew means always being with the oppressed, never with the oppressors.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><cite>Marek Edelman  last surviving leader, Warsaw ghetto uprising</cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Although human rights and international law is meant to apply to all people, expressing pro-Palestian sentiment <a href="https://palestinelegal.org/the-palestine-exception#exec-summary">has long been fraught with difficulty</a>. In the wake of October 7th, speaking out for Palestinian human rights has become <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2023/nov/01/palestine-us-activism-firings-speech">even harder</a>, but it has never been more important to raise your voice and <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/">take action</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">We at Bystanders No More, many of us recovering Bystanders, would like to make it easier for you to act in accordance with your moral compass. We know there are many reasons you might be reluctant to speak openly in support of Palestinians, against Israels policies, or against your governments actions. The pro-Israel lobby is highly influential, and Israels broader political and social machinery is incredibly strong. It stokes fears of being called antisemitic, of losing jobs, status, colleagues, or friends, of feeling powerless, of not knowing enough, of causing offence by saying the wrong thing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size"><strong>Bystanders No More </strong>is here to help.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">On this page, you will find insightful information, research, reporting and analysis by respected scholars, political scientists, activists, lawyers, academics and journalists who are rarely featured on mainstream media. We hope this will help you understand what is happening to Palestinians today and why so that you can form your own opinion and choose what actions to take. You can search by topic or by format.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">We hope you find the resources here useful, thought-provoking, and inspiring as you build the confidence you need to explain your perspective and <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/">take action</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Feel free to <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/contact-us/">suggest</a> compelling and novel content about Palestine that you think deserves a bigger audience.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:separator {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|40","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|40"}}},"backgroundColor":"contrast-2","className":"is-style-wide"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-contrast-2-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-2-background-color has-background is-style-wide" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:query {"queryId":396,"query":{"perPage":"10","pages":0,"offset":0,"postType":"post","order":"desc","orderBy":"date","author":"","search":"","exclude":[],"sticky":"","inherit":false,"taxQuery":{"category":[45]}},"align":"wide","layout":{"type":"default"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-query alignwide"><!-- wp:heading {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1","fontSize":"large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color has-large-font-size">Learn more</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:post-template {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<!-- wp:separator {"backgroundColor":"contrast-3","className":"alignwide is-style-wide"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-contrast-3-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-3-background-color has-background alignwide is-style-wide"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"center","align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|20","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|20"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-center" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center","width":"72%","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center has-medium-font-size" style="flex-basis:72%"><!-- wp:post-title {"isLink":true,"rel":"what-can-you-do-when-you-are-accused-of-antisemitism-for-speaking-out-against-israels-actions-in-the-middle-east","style":{"typography":{"lineHeight":"1.1","fontSize":"1.5rem"}}} /--></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center","width":"28%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center" style="flex-basis:28%"><!-- wp:template-part {"slug":"post-meta","theme":"twentytwentyfour"} /--></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->
<!-- /wp:post-template --></div>
<!-- /wp:query --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:separator {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|40","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|40"}}},"backgroundColor":"contrast-2","className":"is-style-wide"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-contrast-2-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-2-background-color has-background is-style-wide" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1","fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color has-large-font-size">Resources</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Here you will find articles, videos, interviews, conversations and speeches about the history, politics and ideologies of Israel and Palestine.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Important as these resources are, do remember that there will always be more to learn about the ideas, decisions and events that have shaped this region - the onion will always have another layer. Don't use this as an excuse for not taking action now. Rather take action, be challenged, learn what you want to learn and keep growing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<li class="has-medium-font-size"><a href="#videoresources" data-type="internal" data-id="#videoresources">Videos</a></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->

<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
