<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.5rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" id="videoresources" style="font-size:1.5rem">Videos</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:table {"hasFixedLayout":true,"style":{"border":{"width":"1px"}},"className":"is-style-regular","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-table is-style-regular has-medium-font-size"><table class="has-fixed-layout" style="border-width:1px"><tbody><tr><td><a href="https://www.aljazeera.com/program/upfront/2023/10/27/angela-davis-palestine-is-a-moral-litmus-test-for-the-world" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Palestine is a moral litmus test for the world</a></td><td>Scholar-activist Angela Davis links Palestine to other liberatory struggles around the globe, highlighting the longstanding solidarity between Black Americans and Palestinians.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://youtu.be/sYvhWfiuFjg?si=rWbn3N7SVCxQ2g9C" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><br>A History of Jewish Anti-Zionism: From The Communist Party to The New Left</a></td><td>Dr. Benjamin Balthaser is associate professor of multi-ethnic US literature at Indiana University. His book, Citizens of the Whole World: The American Jewish Left and Cultures of Anti-Zionism, is due to be out this fall (Verso).</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://chrishedges.substack.com/p/the-algebra-of-genocide" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The Algebra of Genocide</a></td><td><a target="_blank" href="https://www.chrislhedges.com/about" rel="noreferrer noopener">Chris Hedges</a>, Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist who was a foreign correspondent for 15 years for The New York Times, discusses genocide, censorship, and international law.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://youtu.be/b8512p-80wI?si=GY8vAi1S1qhABZ_5" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Q&amp;A with Francesca Albanese, Special Rapporteur on the occupied Palestinian territory</a></td><td>UN Special Rapporteur determines the threshold indicating Israel is committing the crime of genocide against the people of Palestine has been met.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://scienceandnonduality.com/videos/a-call-for-healing/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">A Call for Healing</a></td><td>Author and trauma specialist Dr. Gabor Mat discusses Palestine and Israel from the perpective of a Holocaust survivor who has dedicated his life to studying (and working through) trauma and finding paths to repair.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.democracynow.org/2024/5/3/state_dept" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">This Militaristic Approach Has Been a Failure: Meet Hala Rharrit, First U.S. Diplomat to Quit over Gaza</a></td><td>The first U.S. diplomat to quit over Gaza speaks with Democracy Now! to confirm diplomats understand sending military equipment to countries committing human rights abuses is a violation of domestic law.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.democracynow.org/2024/5/21/lily_greenberg_call_resignation" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Meet Lily Greenberg Call, First Jewish Biden Appointee to Publicly Resign over Gaza</a></td><td>The first Jewish Biden appointee to publicly resign over Gaza talks with Democracy Now! and shares about the disconnect between Jewish values, Jewish safety, and Biden's words and actions in the ongoing war.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://youtu.be/9fzBf7Omllk?si=1n4q8m60sUxwx04S" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Israels "Systematic Strategy" to Destroy Palestinians</a></td><td>Dr. Mads Gilbert is a Norwegian physician who worked in Palestine (including at Al Shifa Hospital for 16+ years) and offers a medical professional's perspective on the destruction of healthcare infrastructure in Gaza.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://youtu.be/5mj9JgID-xM?si=nl7zFGcPWw7W2MgG" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Situation in Gaza traumatising for humanitarian aid workers: UN coordinator</a></td><td>Martin Griffiths, the UN Humanitarian Affairs and Emergency Relief Coordinator, highlighted the severe humanitarian crisis in Gaza. He also noted the global trend of impunity for violence, urging stronger international efforts to address such crises.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/posts/michael-fakhri-43522228b_my-remarks-on-gaza-a-few-weeks-ago-to-the-activity-7176045063003623424-z5Rf?utm_source=share&amp;utm_medium=member_desktop" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">[Video] Michael Fakhri on LinkedIn: My remarks on Gaza a few weeks ago to the UN Human Rights Council. The</a></td><td>Michael Fakhri is the UN expert (Special Rapporteur) on the Right to Food. He is generally a softly spoken academic but he gave this very serious warning about using starvation as a weapon of war in March 2024.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.democracynow.org/2024/4/24/naomi_klein_seder" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Naomi Klein: Jews Must Raise Their Voices for Palestine, Oppose the False Idol of Zionism</a></td><td>Renowned author Naomi Klein is one of the leading progressive Jewish thought leaders in North America. She was initially supportive of Israel's right to self defence but has since become a vocal critic of Israel and US policy.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://youtu.be/ELNr_ro97MI?si=kEhY9h2tWdrxPO4d" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The US Could Have Stopped Israel on Day One</a></td><td>Professor and author Norman Finkelstein, named the fifth most influential political scientist in the world for the years 2000-2020, is a son of Holocaust survivors advocating for Palestinian liberation.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://youtu.be/xXSsAA2J2Lw?si=drPQ9IZ6X_FDYOgq" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">A world where self-defence is used as justification for genocide</a></td><td>Professor and human rights attorney Noura Erakat explains the binding nature of international law and Western complicity in the ongoing tragedies in Gaza.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://youtu.be/XIJrFuuRspo?si=r7Yjs-Hn6GjrRode" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Endgame For Netanyahu? - Israeli Analyst Ori Goldberg Gives Devastating Assessment</a></td><td>Ori Goldberg is an Israeli analyst, interdisciplinary scholar, and senior researcher whose work focuses on the interaction between religious faith and political behavior.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.democracynow.org/2024/4/4/dr_thaer_ahmad_biden_gaza_israel" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Palestinian American Dr. Walks Out of Biden Meeting, Hands Him Letter from 8-Year-Old Orphan in Gaza | Democracy Now!</a></td><td>Palestinian-American doctor Thaer Ahmad makes a strong moral argument to elected officials and those in positions of power.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://www.zeteo.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><a href="https://www.middleeastmonitor.com/20240621-us-congressman-killing-civilians-is-a-necessary-price-to-pay/" data-type="link" data-id="https://www.middleeastmonitor.com/20240621-us-congressman-killing-civilians-is-a-necessary-price-to-pay/">US Congressman Says Killing Civilians is A Necessary Price to Pay </a></a></td><td>Award-winning, British American journalist, best-selling author and founder of Zeteo. Previous writer with Intercept, New Statesman.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=taXIbXYt6YY" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=taXIbXYt6YY&amp;ab_channel=NDISC">The Israel Lobby with John Mearsheimer and Stephen Wal</a></a></td><td>Jewish American political analyst and professor at Kennedy School of Government and Stephen Walt (prof at U of Chicago) make the case for the existence of an Israeli Lobby.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cjgFyvxv1QA" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Nero's Guests</a></td><td><a target="_blank" href="https://www.chrislhedges.com/about" rel="noreferrer noopener">Chris Hedges</a>, Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist who was a foreign correspondent for 15 years for The New York Times, discusses genocide, censorship, and international law.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/think/opinion/how-jews-can-support-palestinian-rights-condemn-antisemitism-ncna1268680" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/think/opinion/how-jews-can-support-palestinian-rights-condemn-antisemitism-ncna1268680" data-type="link" data-id="https://www.nbcnews.com/think/opinion/how-jews-can-support-palestinian-rights-condemn-antisemitism-ncna1268680">Supporting Palestinian rights is antisemitic because Israel wants it to be</a></a></td><td>Abraham Gutman, an Israeli economist and writer, is an opinion staff writer at The Philadelphia Inquirer.</td></tr></tbody></table></figure>
<!-- /wp:table -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.5rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" id="articleresources" style="font-size:1.5rem">Articles</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:table {"hasFixedLayout":true,"style":{"border":{"width":"1px"}},"className":"is-style-regular","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-table is-style-regular has-medium-font-size"><table class="has-fixed-layout" style="border-width:1px"><tbody><tr><td>No<a target="_blank" href="https://www.timesofisrael.com/no-doubt-netanyahu-preventing-hostage-deal-charges-ex-spokesman-of-families-forum/amp/" rel="noreferrer noopener"> doubt' Netanyahu preventing hostage deal, charges ex-spokesman of Families Forum | The Times of Israel</a></td><td>A former spokesman for the Hostages and Missing Families Forum makes the case that the Netanyahu administration has not prioritised the release of the hostages. Various reasons why are explored.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.npr.org/2023/10/13/1205671704/a-palestinian-view-of-hamas-attack-on-israel-one-of-the-worst-in-israel-s-histor" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">A Palestinian view of Hamas' attack on Israel, one of the worst in Israel's history : NPR</a></td><td>Palestinian politician, activist, and scholar Ashrawi view of Hamas' attack on Israel, one of the worst in Israel's history</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://jameszogby.com/washingtonwatch2023/the-us-needs-to-say-no-to-israel-and-yes-to-palestine" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The US Needs to Say No to Israel and Yes to Palestine  James Zogby</a></td><td>James Zogby is a longtime member of the Democratic National Committee and founder of the Arab American Institute. Here he makes the case for changing US policy.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.wgi.world/placing-gaza-in-the-broader-u-s-foreign-policy-context-an-interview-with-josh-paul/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Placing Gaza in the Broader U.S. Foreign Policy Context: an interview with Josh Paul - World Geostrategic Insights</a></td><td>Josh Paul worked directly in arms transfers for the U.S. State Department. He resigned in October 2023 in protest of providing weapons for Israel's military campaign in Gaza.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://brenebrown.com/podcast/blind-spot-america-and-the-palestinians-from-balfour-to-trump/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Khaled Elgindy on his book: Blind Spot: America and the Palestinians, from Balfour to Trump</a></td><td>Khaled Elgindy is a political analyst and former Palestinian negotiator. In this audio recording, he discusses America's failed peacemaking efforts between Israel and Palestine with host Brene Brown.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.palestinechronicle.com/where-is-international-lawmustafa-barghouti-slams-western-governments-hypocrisy/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Where is International Law? - Mustafa Barghouti Slams Western Governments Hypocrisy - Palestine Chronicle</a></td><td>Palestinian politician and activist Mustafa Barghouti calls international law into question. We are not talking about Palestine here, we are talking about the global order of the world.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.foreignaffairs.com/podcasts/gaza-and-breakdown-international-law-oona-hathaway" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Gaza and the Breakdown of International Law | Foreign Affairs</a></td><td>Legal scholar Oona Hathaway writes in Foreign Affairs, The conflict in Gaza is an extreme example of the breakdown of the law of war, but it is not an isolated one.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.palestinechronicle.com/we-have-to-take-sides-rev-munther-isaacs-says-gaza-genocide-has-divided-the-world/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">We Have to Take Sides - Rev Munther Isaacs Says Gaza Genocide Has Divided the World - Palestine Chronicle</a></td><td>Palestinian Christian pastor Rev Isaac Munther makes a moral case for taking sides.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/palestinian-ireland-israel-irish-palestinians-b2544698.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Ireland should impose sanctions on Israel to stop Palestinian deaths  activists | The Independent</a></td><td>Palestinian human rights leader Jabarin says that Ireland should impose sanctions on Israel to stop Palestinian deaths.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://al-shabaka.org/commentaries/the-gaza-genocide-in-western-media-culprits-of-complicity/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The Gaza Genocide in Western Media: Culprits of Complicity | Al-Shabaka</a></td><td>Palestinian policy expert Hawari details Western media complicity in the conflict.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://foreignpolicy.com/2024/06/13/gaza-ukraine-ceasefire-war-peace-morality/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">In Gaza and Ukraine, morality is the enemy of peace</a></td><td>Stephen Walt is Professor of International Relations at KSG and Political Analyst.<br></td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://theintercept.com/2023/11/27/israel-democrats-aipac-book/">A big money operation purged critics of Israel form the Democratic Party</a></td><td>Ryan Grim is The Intercepts D.C. Bureau Chief and the host of the podcast Deconstructed. He authors the newsletter Politics With Ryan Grim and was previously the Washington bureau chief for HuffPost, where he led a team that was twice a finalist for the Pulitzer Prize, and won once.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.thenation.com/article/archive/aipac-omar-israel-congress-anti-semitism/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">This is how AIPAC really works, The Nation</a></td><td>M.J. Rosenberg worked as a Senate and House aide, at the State Department, at the American Israel Public Affairs Committee (AIPAC), at Israel Policy Forum, and at Media Matters For America.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://hammerandhope.org/article/arundhati-roy-palestine-gaza" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Stop this slaughter</a></td><td>Arundathi Roy is an Indian author and political activist best known for her novel, God of Small Things. She is also the winner of the Pen Pinter Prize for 2024.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2024/06/21/jamaal-bowman-israel-trip-reelection-00163788" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The Israel trip that made Jamaal Bowman</a></td><td>Calder McHugh is an American writer and journalist</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.salon.com/2024/02/04/why-its-so-hard-to-talk-about-gaza/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Why is it so hard to talk about Gaza, Salon</a></td><td>Sophia A. McClennen is Professor of International Affairs and Comparative Literature at the Pennsylvania State University.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://jewishcurrents.org/interrogating-the-new-antisemitism" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">What is new antisemitism? </a></td><td>Antony Lerman is a British writer and specialist in the study of antisemitism, the IsraeliPalestinian conflict, multiculturalism, and the place of religion in society. From 2006 to early 2009, he was Director of the Institute for Jewish Policy Research, a think tank on issues affecting Jewish communities in Europe.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.middleeasteye.net/opinion/palestinian-journalist-gaza-take-away-award-will-not-take-away-my-voice" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">You can take away my award, but you won't take away my voice, Maha Husseini</a></td><td>Maha Hussaini is an award-winning journalist and human rights activist based in Gaza. Maha started her journalism career by covering Israels military campaign on the Gaza Strip in July 2014. In 2020, she won the prestigious Martin Adler Prize for her work as a freelance journalist.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.foreignaffairs.com/israel/middle-east-robert-pape" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Why Israel's failing strategy is making its enemy stronger, Robert Pape</a></td><td>Robert Pape is a Palestinian politician, activist and scholar.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.jewishvoiceforlabour.org.uk/article/a-culture-of-denial/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Tolerance is a Wasteland, Saree Makdisi - A review</a></td><td>Saree Makdisi is an American literary critic and professor; specializing in eighteenth and nineteenth century British literature. He is of Palestinian and Lebanese descent. He also writes on contemporary Arab politics and culture.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://thepalestineproject.medium.com/yes-it-is-genocide-634a07ea27d4" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Yes, it is genocide</a></td><td>Dr. Amos Goldberg is a Jewish Holocaust specialist who lives in Israel and works as the <a target="_blank" href="https://watson.brown.edu/cmes/people/amos-goldberg" rel="noreferrer noopener">Jonah M. Machover Chair in Holocaust Studies</a> in the Department of Jewish History and Contemporary Jewry at The Hebrew University of Jerusalem. He makes the case that "the fact that what is happening in Gaza does not resemble the [Nazi] Holocaust does not mean that it is not genocide."</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://theideasletter.substack.com/p/seeing-gaza-clearly" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Seein Gaza Clearly by Daniel Levy</a></td><td>Daniel Levy is the <a target="_blank" href="https://www.usmep.us/mission/" rel="noreferrer noopener">President of the U.S./Middle East Project (USMEP)</a> and served as a senior Israeli peace negotiator. His take on why Jewish students are playing such a major role in the student protests is illuminating and hopeful.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.lrb.co.uk/the-paper/v46/n08/eyal-weizman/diary" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Diary: Three Genocides</a></td><td>British-Isreali architect and professor Eyal Weizman details the Palestine conflict through the lens of Germany's policy of extermination of Nama and Ovaherero peoples in South-West Africa (now called Namibia).</td></tr></tbody></table></figure>
<!-- /wp:table -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.5rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" id="websiteresources" style="font-size:1.5rem">Websites</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:table {"hasFixedLayout":true,"style":{"border":{"width":"1px"}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-table has-medium-font-size"><table class="has-fixed-layout" style="border-width:1px"><tbody><tr><td><a href="https://foreignpolicy.com/2024/06/13/gaza-ukraine-ceasefire-war-peace-morality/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Zeteo</a></td><td>Zeteo, a new media organization describes itself as a movement for media accountability, unfiltered news and bold opinions. An alternative to mainstream media news.</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://al-shabaka.org/authors/omar-shaban/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Al-shabaka: Omar Shaban</a></td><td><br><br>Omar Shaban is a Palestinian commentator, writer, activist. He is the Founder and Director of the Gaza-based PalThink for Strategic Studies an independent think tank with no political affiliation. He is an analyst of the political-economy of the Middle East and is a regular writer and commentator for the Arab and international media. Founder of Palestinian groups for Amnesty International</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://www.jewishvoiceforlabour.org.uk/statement/antisemitic-misconduct/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Jewish Voice for Labour: Antisemitic Misconduct</a></td><td>Jewish Voices for Labour - "a community for Jewish labour party members, ex-members and never been members"</td></tr><tr><td><a href="https://palestinelegal.org/the-palestine-exception#exec-summary" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">The Palestine Exception</a></td><td>Founded in 2012, Palestine Legal is an independent organization dedicated to protecting the civil and constitutional rights of people in the US who speak out for Palestinian freedom. Palestine Legal is the only legal organization in the United States exclusively dedicated to supporting the movement for Palestinian rights.</td></tr></tbody></table></figure>
<!-- /wp:table --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>19530</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2024-06-27 09:07:54]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2024-06-27 08:07:54]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-11 09:49:39]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-11 08:49:39]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>-3</wp:menu_order>

		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_oembed_aad938f9b0f64fe36915d83ad46c0d74]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[{{unknown}}]]></wp:meta_value>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[burst_total_pageviews_count]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[What can you do when you are accused of antisemitism for speaking out against Israels actions in the Middle East?]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/resources/what-can-you-do-when-you-are-accused-of-antisemitism-for-speaking-out-against-israels-actions-in-the-middle-east/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 27 Jun 2024 09:13:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[eller_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=19606</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color">The best way to deal with being called antisemitic is to be prepared for it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Speaking out against what the state of Israel is doing is an act of courage with the potential for life-changing consequences. To speak out is to invite accusations of ignorance if not antisemitism; of <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2023/oct/21/israel-hamas-conflict-palestinian-voices-censored">sympathising with terrorists</a>; to risk being <a href="https://www.cbsnews.com/news/google-fires-28-employees-after-protest-against-contract-with-israeli-government/">fired</a> or forced to <a href="https://www.politico.eu/article/paddy-cosgrave-web-summit-ceo-europe-tech-conference-resign-israel-hamas-comment/">resign</a>; to be told to <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/posts/sibilspeaks_sibilspeaks-liberation-valuesalignment-activity-7208473570346237952-aQpa?utm_source=share&amp;utm_medium=member_desktop">go home</a> or to be <a href="https://www.womeninjournalism.org/threats-all/united-states-international-womens-media-foundation-rescinds-courage-in-journalism-award-given-to-maha-hussaini">publicly humiliated</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Being <a href="https://www.jewishvoiceforlabour.org.uk/statement/how-labours-claim-of-countering-antisemitism-has-resulted-in-a-purge-of-jews/">Jewish</a> is no protection with many accused of being self hating Jews or worse. These attacks serve an important purpose: it silences people who might want to speak out but are unsure of where exactly justifiable criticism ends and antisemitism begins. That is by design: Israel has successfully weaponized accusations of antisemitism by equating support of Palestinian rights with antisemitism, <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/think/opinion/how-jews-can-support-palestinian-rights-condemn-antisemitism-ncna1268680">says Abraham Gutman</a>, US-based Israeli economist and writer.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem">What is Antisemitism?&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Jewish Voices for Labour describes it as a<a href="https://www.jewishvoiceforlabour.org.uk/"> form of racism consisting of prejudice, hostility or hatred towards Jews as Jews</a> but it adds an important caveat:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size"><em>Jews, Israelis and Zionists are separate categories that are too frequently conflated by both supporters and critics of Israel. This conflation can be antisemitic. Holding all Jews responsible for the actions of the Israeli government is antisemitic. Many Jews are not Zionist. </em><strong><em>The majority of Zionists are not Jewish but fundamentalist Christian Zionists</em></strong><em>. Over 20 percent of Israeli citizens are not Jewish.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Criticism of the Israeli government in the Middle East is often conflated with antisemitism because Israel describes itself as the nation-state of the Jewish people  <a href="https://embassies.gov.il/un/AboutTheEmbassy/Pages/about-the-mission.aspx">representing the State of Israel, its citizens and the Jewish people on the global stage</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem">The New AntiSemitism&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Israeli institutions and advocacy organisations around the world have been working to codify this new definition, framing opposition to the Jewish state as the principal manifestation of antisemitism [thereby putting] Israel at the centre of Jewish identity.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">By suggesting that anti-Zionism equals antisemitism, this <em><a href="https://jewishcurrents.org/interrogating-the-new-antisemitism">new antisemitism</a> drains the word antisemitism of any useful meaning</em> argues <a href="https://jewishcurrents.org/interrogating-the-new-antisemitism">Antony Lerman</a>, writer and former Director at the Institute for Jewish Policy Research. According to this definition you can be antisemitic if you hold any view <em>ranging from criticism of the policies of the Israeli government to denial that Israel has the right to exist as a Jewish state</em> even if you dont hold any of the views traditionally associated with antisemitism such as <em>hatred of Jews per se, belief in a worldwide Jewish conspiracy, belief that Jews generated communism and control capitalism.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Under this definition, pro-Palestinian speech or advocacy effectively and immediately becomes antisemitic. Jewish advocates for Palestinian rights or critics of the Israeli government are similarly disparaged as self-hating Jews. As absurd as that is, it explains both our confusion and our caution.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem">When are you not being antisemitic?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">A more useful definition of antisemitism is contained in <a href="https://jerusalemdeclaration.org/">The Jerusalem Declaration on Antisemitism</a> (JDA) notes Daniel Levy, a BritishIsraeli who has served as an Israeli peace negotiator, is one of the founders of J Street (a liberal Zionist advocacy group) and the current President of the US-Middle East Project (USMEP). Written by scholars of Jewish and Middle Eastern history, antisemitism and the Holocaust, the JDA explains antisemitism in a way that allows for continuing dialogue and debate around the question of Israel and Palestine, he <a href="https://theideasletter.substack.com/p/seeing-gaza-clearly">says</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">According to the JDA, you are not being antisemitic simply by advocating for the <em>Palestinian demand for justice, opposing Zionism, comparing Israel with other historical cases including settler colonialism or apartheid, calling for boycott, divestment and sanctions, and arguing for a variety of constitutional arrangements for Jews and Palestinians</em>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Nevertheless, in the current climate, its almost inevitable that you will be accused of antisemitism or self-hate if you choose to criticise the Israeli governments behaviour or publicly advocate for Palestinian rights.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem">What should you do when youre accused of being an antisemite?&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">The best strategy is to be prepared and to stay calm when the accusations start flying. It is also perfectly sensible to think carefully about <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/social-media-advocacy/">where and how you engage in advocacy</a> if your employer or your clients are pro-Israel. Finally, when you do speak, speak from a position of knowledge that comes from credible sources. Dont get caught out by spreading misinformation or quoting actual antisemites. It wont matter whether that particular quote is thoughtful or not. It will be tainted by association and you with it. Its also unnecessary because there are many very credible critics of the state of Israel, not least highly respected Israeli/Jewish scholars. Finally, theres no point talking to people who dont want to listen. You cannot change their minds. Talk to the ones willing to see, listen, understand and take action.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>19606</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2024-06-27 10:13:43]]></wp:post_date>

		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-11 08:43:28]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-11 07:43:28]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>

		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="resources"><![CDATA[Resources]]></category>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_page_template]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[burst_total_pageviews_count]]></wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Bystanders No More]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 15 Jul 2024 05:55:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[elena_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?page_id=19686</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:group {"metadata":{"name":"Home page header"},"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0","left":"var:preset|spacing|20","right":"var:preset|spacing|20"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}},"color":{"background":"#0d0d11"}},"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-background" style="background-color:#0d0d11;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:0;padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-bottom:0;padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"center","align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|50","left":"var:preset|spacing|50"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-center"><!-- wp:column {"width":"66.66%","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|30","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|30"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"left","level":1,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"4.1rem","letterSpacing":"2px"},"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"var:preset|spacing|10","left":"var:preset|spacing|10","top":"0","bottom":"0"}}},"textColor":"base"} -->
<h1 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-base-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="padding-top:0;padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:0;padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);font-size:4.1rem;letter-spacing:2px"><strong>Bystanders No More.</strong></h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:columns -->
<div class="wp-block-columns"><!-- wp:column {"width":"66.66%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"typography":{"lineHeight":"1.5"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","right":"0"},"margin":{"right":"var:preset|spacing|10","left":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"textColor":"base","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left has-base-color has-text-color has-link-color has-medium-font-size" style="margin-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-top:0;padding-right:0;padding-bottom:0;padding-left:0;line-height:1.5">Helping  people speak up about human rights in Palestine.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":"33.33%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:33.33%"><!-- wp:image {"id":19718,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","style":{"color":{"duotone":"unset"}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/BNM_Launch_All-People_03-edited.jpg" alt="A photograph of a woman possibly a teacher, at the front of a class, with the words overlaid: &quot;Do you believe in basic human rights for all people&quot;, and two check boxes saying &quot;yes&quot; and &quot;no&quot;." class="wp-image-19718"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group {"metadata":{"name":"Home page intro blurb"},"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}},"color":{"background":"#f5f5f5"}},"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-background" style="background-color:#f5f5f5;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)"><!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"center","align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":{"top":"0","left":"var:preset|spacing|20"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"},"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}}},"fontSize":"small"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-center has-small-font-size" style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center","width":"50%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center" style="flex-basis:50%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-large-font-size" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)">If...</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"color":{"text":"#000000"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-color has-medium-font-size" style="color:#000000;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0"> You believe in human rights and international law.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"color":{"text":"#000000"}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-color has-medium-font-size" style="color:#000000">  You care about all people  including Palestinians.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"color":{"text":"#000000"}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-color has-medium-font-size" style="color:#000000"> You are concerned about the atrocities in Gaza.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center","width":"50%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center" style="flex-basis:50%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"color":{"text":"#000000"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"fontSize":"large"} -->
<p class="has-text-color has-large-font-size" style="color:#000000;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)">But...</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"color":{"text":"#000000"}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-color has-medium-font-size" style="color:#000000"> You worry youll be labelled antisemitic or pro-Hamas if you speak out.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"color":{"text":"#000000"}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-color has-medium-font-size" style="color:#000000"> You think that you (and the public) are powerless in this situation.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"color":{"text":"#000000"}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-color has-medium-font-size" style="color:#000000">  You dont feel educated enough to take action.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"4px"} -->
<div style="height:4px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>You are not alone.</strong> And you've found the right place.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"4px"} -->
<div style="height:4px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group {"metadata":{"name":"Links to key pages"},"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|30","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|30","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}}},"backgroundColor":"base-2","layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-base-2-background-color has-background" style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"4px"} -->
<div style="height:4px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast-2"}}}},"textColor":"contrast-2","fontSize":"x-large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading alignwide has-contrast-2-color has-text-color has-link-color has-x-large-font-size">Get Informed</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"9px"} -->
<div style="height:9px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:columns {"metadata":{"name":"Cards"},"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|40","left":"var:preset|spacing|20"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"},"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide" style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0"><!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"FAQs"},"style":{"shadow":"var:preset|shadow|natural"},"backgroundColor":"contrast"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-contrast-background-color has-background" style="box-shadow:var(--wp--preset--shadow--natural)"><!-- wp:cover {"url":"https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Find-practical-answers-to-common-questions-that-tend-to-prevent-concerned-citizens-from-speaking-up.png","id":19823,"dimRatio":0,"overlayColor":"contrast","isUserOverlayColor":true,"focalPoint":{"x":0.72,"y":0.39},"minHeight":372,"minHeightUnit":"px","contentPosition":"center center","style":{"color":{},"border":{"radius":"0px","width":"0px","style":"none"}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover" style="border-style:none;border-width:0px;border-radius:0px;min-height:372px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-contrast-background-color has-background-dim-0 has-background-dim"></span><img class="wp-block-cover__image-background wp-image-19823" alt="" src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Find-practical-answers-to-common-questions-that-tend-to-prevent-concerned-citizens-from-speaking-up.png" style="object-position:72% 39%" data-object-fit="cover" data-object-position="72% 39%"/><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"center","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base-2"}}}},"textColor":"base-2","fontSize":"large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-base-2-color has-text-color has-link-color has-large-font-size"><strong>FAQ</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"var:preset|spacing|20","left":"var:preset|spacing|20","top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)">Find practical answers to <strong>common questions</strong> that tend to prevent concerned citizens from speaking up about Palestine. &nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"backgroundColor":"base","textColor":"contrast","width":75,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast"}}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 has-custom-font-size has-medium-font-size"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-contrast-color has-base-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/faqs/">Go to FAQ</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"Card 1: Resources"},"style":{"color":{"background":"#000000"}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-background" style="background-color:#000000"><!-- wp:cover {"url":"https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Find-practical-answers-to-common-questions-that-tend-to-prevent-concerned-citizens-from-speaking-up.-1.png","id":19824,"dimRatio":0,"overlayColor":"contrast","isUserOverlayColor":true,"minHeight":373,"minHeightUnit":"px","contentPosition":"center center","style":{"color":{},"border":{"radius":"0px","width":"0px","style":"none"}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover" style="border-style:none;border-width:0px;border-radius:0px;min-height:373px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-contrast-background-color has-background-dim-0 has-background-dim"></span><img class="wp-block-cover__image-background wp-image-19824" alt="" src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Find-practical-answers-to-common-questions-that-tend-to-prevent-concerned-citizens-from-speaking-up.-1.png" data-object-fit="cover"/><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"center","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base-2"}}}},"textColor":"base-2","fontSize":"large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-base-2-color has-text-color has-link-color has-large-font-size"><strong>RESOURCES</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"var:preset|spacing|20","left":"var:preset|spacing|20","top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)">Access a helpful collection of <strong>videos, articles and sites</strong> to gain knowledge and build confidence in your position.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"backgroundColor":"base","textColor":"contrast","width":75,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast"}}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 has-custom-font-size has-medium-font-size"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-contrast-color has-base-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/resources">Go to Resources</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"Card 2: Actions"},"style":{"shadow":"var:preset|shadow|natural"},"backgroundColor":"contrast"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-contrast-background-color has-background" style="box-shadow:var(--wp--preset--shadow--natural)"><!-- wp:cover {"url":"https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Find-practical-answers-to-common-questions-that-tend-to-prevent-concerned-citizens-from-speaking-up.-2.png","id":19826,"alt":"A young, hungry child waits in a crowd to receive food into their empty container, in Gaza","dimRatio":0,"customOverlayColor":"#222222","isUserOverlayColor":true,"minHeight":374,"minHeightUnit":"px","contentPosition":"center center","isDark":false,"style":{"color":{},"border":{"radius":"0px","width":"0px","style":"none"}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-cover is-light" style="border-style:none;border-width:0px;border-radius:0px;min-height:374px"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-0 has-background-dim" style="background-color:#222222"></span><img class="wp-block-cover__image-background wp-image-19826" alt="A young, hungry child waits in a crowd to receive food into their empty container, in Gaza" src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Find-practical-answers-to-common-questions-that-tend-to-prevent-concerned-citizens-from-speaking-up.-2.png" data-object-fit="cover"/><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container"><!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"center","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base-2"}}}},"textColor":"base-2","fontSize":"large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-base-2-color has-text-color has-link-color has-large-font-size"><strong>SURVEY</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"spacing":{"padding":{"right":"var:preset|spacing|20","left":"var:preset|spacing|20","top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"textColor":"base","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-base-color has-text-color has-link-color has-medium-font-size" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)">Explore our <strong>survey results</strong> to better understand what drives bystander behaviour on universal human rights for Palestinians.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"backgroundColor":"base","textColor":"contrast","width":75,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast"}}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 has-custom-font-size has-medium-font-size"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-contrast-color has-base-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/survey/">Go to Survey</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:cover --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group {"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}}},"backgroundColor":"base-2","fontSize":"medium","layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-base-2-background-color has-background has-medium-font-size" style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:0;padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-bottom:0;padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast-2"}}}},"textColor":"contrast-2"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading alignwide has-contrast-2-color has-text-color has-link-color">Get Involved</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"9px"} -->
<div style="height:9px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:group {"align":"wide","style":{"border":{"radius":"0px"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|20","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|20","left":"var:preset|spacing|50","right":"var:preset|spacing|50"}},"background":{"backgroundImage":{"url":"https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Untitled-design-2024-07-12T132923.357.png","id":19773,"source":"file","title":"Untitled-design-2024-07-12T132923.357"}}},"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide" style="border-radius:0px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--50)"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"typography":{"lineHeight":"1.5"}},"textColor":"base","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-base-color has-text-color has-link-color has-medium-font-size" style="line-height:1.5">A basic sense of right and wrong is all that is required to stand up now against the collective punishment of civilians. No degree or specialized expertise is necessary, and taking action doesnt always look like taking to the streets to protest or being outspoken on social media.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"typography":{"lineHeight":"1.5"}},"textColor":"base","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-base-color has-text-color has-link-color has-medium-font-size" style="line-height:1.5">Concerned citizens can <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/policies/">lobby elected officials to support policies</a>, <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/organisations-to-support/">donate to organizations</a>, join the <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/advocacy-without-social-media/">Boycott, Divestment &amp; Sanctions movement</a> and simply <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/powerful-constructive-conversations/">talk to friends and family</a>. Each of us may choose different ways to help stop the atrocities, but we all must <em>do something</em>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"backgroundColor":"base","textColor":"contrast","width":75,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast"}}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 has-custom-font-size has-medium-font-size"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-contrast-color has-base-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/take-action/">Take Action</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"var:preset|spacing|10"} -->
<div style="height:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:group {"metadata":{"name":"A Safe Space"},"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|40","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|40","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}},"color":{"background":"#f5f5f5"}},"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-background" style="background-color:#f5f5f5;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)"><!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":"center","align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|50","left":"var:preset|spacing|40"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide are-vertically-aligned-center"><!-- wp:column {"width":"66.66%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:group {"layout":{"type":"flex","flexWrap":"nowrap"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","fontSize":"x-large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading alignwide has-x-large-font-size">Building Bravery</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Our work&nbsp;is rooted in the belief that&nbsp;<strong>people&nbsp;power democracies.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">We believe that people become empowered to act upon their beliefs and values when they can access trustworthy resources and a safer place to learn.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Our goal is to provide supportive education and actionable suggestions&nbsp;for people who are ready (or nearly ready) to take a public stance for Palestine.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"width":"40%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column" style="flex-basis:40%"><!-- wp:image {"id":19649,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none","style":{"color":{"duotone":"unset"}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Untitled-4.jpg" alt="A black and white image of a baby swaddled in a keffiyeh, in front of bright red poppies, and above the words &quot;Long Live Palestine&quot;" class="wp-image-19649"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

{\"align\":\"full\",\"style\":{\"spacing\":{\"padding\":{\"top\":\"var:preset|spacing|10\",\"bottom\":\"var:preset|spacing|10\",\"left\":\"var:preset|spacing|50\",\"right\":\"var:preset|spacing|50\"}}}} -->\n<div class=\"wp-block-columns alignfull\" wp:column {\"width\":\"100%\",\"style\":{\"spacing\":{\"padding\":{\"top\":\"var:preset|spacing|20\",\"bottom\":\"var:preset|spacing|20\"}}},\"layout\":{\"type\":\"constrained\",\"contentSize\":\"1000px\"}} -->\n<div class=\"wp-block-column\" style=\"padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);flex-basis:100%\"><!-- wp:image {\"id\":19258,\"width\":\"112px\",\"height\":\"auto\",\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image size-large is-resized\"><img src=\"https:\/\/www.bystandersnomore.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2024\/06\/BNM-logo_humanity-1024x1024.png\" alt=\"\" class=\"wp-image-19258\" style=\"width:112px;height:auto\"\/><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u2705 You believe in human rights and international law.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u2705 You care about all people \u2013 including Palestinians.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u2705 You are concerned about the atrocities in Gaza.&nbsp;<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>But\u2026<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u274c You\u2019re worried you\u2019ll be labelled as antisemitic or pro-Hamas if you speak out.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u274c You think you (and the public in general) are powerless in this situation.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u274c And you don\u2019t feel educated enough to take action.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>You are not alone. And you\u2019ve found the right place.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:columns -->\n<div class=\"wp-block-columns\"><!-- wp:column {\"width\":\"66.66%\"} -->\n<div class=\"wp-block-column\" style=\"flex-basis:66.66%\"><!-- wp:spacer {\"height\":\"19px\"} -->\n<div style=\"height:19px\" aria-hidden=\"true\" class=\"wp-block-spacer\"><\/div>\n<!-- \/wp:spacer -->\n\n<!-- wp:heading {\"textAlign\":\"center\",\"level\":1,\"style\":{\"typography\":{\"fontSize\":\"27px\",\"fontStyle\":\"normal\",\"fontWeight\":\"500\",\"textTransform\":\"uppercase\",\"lineHeight\":1.6},\"elements\":{\"link\":{\"color\":{\"text\":\"var:preset|color|vivid-red\"}}}},\"textColor\":\"vivid-red\"} -->\n<h1 class=\"wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-vivid-red-color has-text-color has-link-color\" style=\"font-size:27px;font-style:normal;font-weight:500;line-height:1.6;text-transform:uppercase\"><strong>Bystanders no more<\/strong> <\/h1>\n<!-- \/wp:heading -->\n\n<!-- wp:heading {\"textAlign\":\"center\",\"level\":1,\"style\":{\"typography\":{\"fontSize\":\"17px\",\"fontStyle\":\"normal\",\"fontWeight\":\"500\",\"textTransform\":\"uppercase\",\"lineHeight\":1.6},\"elements\":{\"link\":{\"color\":{\"text\":\"var:preset|color|secondary\"}}}},\"textColor\":\"secondary\"} -->\n<h1 class=\"wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-secondary-color has-text-color has-link-color\" style=\"font-size:17px;font-style:normal;font-weight:500;line-height:1.6;text-transform:uppercase\">is rooted in the belief that <strong>people<\/strong> power democracies.<\/h1>\n<!-- \/wp:heading -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>&nbsp;- and that people become empowered to act upon their beliefs and values when they are given access to trustworthy resources and a safe space to get informed.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The overall goal of this project is to provide supportive education and useful, empowering, <a href=\"https:\/\/www.bystandersnomore.com\/take-action\/\" data-type=\"page\" data-id=\"414\">actionable suggestions<\/a> for people who are ready (or nearly ready) to take a public stance.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/div>\n<!-- \/wp:column -->\n\n<!-- wp:column {\"width\":\"33.33%\"} -->\n<div class=\"wp-block-column\" style=\"flex-basis:33.33%\"><!-- wp:image {\"id\":375,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\",\"style\":{\"color\":{\"duotone\":\"unset\"},\"border\":{\"width\":\"0px\",\"style\":\"none\",\"radius\":\"14px\"}},\"className\":\"is-style-default\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image size-large has-custom-border is-style-default\"><img src=\"https:\/\/www.bystandersnomore.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2024\/06\/keys-1-771x1024.png\" alt=\"\" 							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Learn]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/learn/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:03:08 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[a56dfb_C0l8y]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?page_id=19690</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:columns {"verticalAlignment":null,"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}},"border":{"radius":"4px","width":"2px"}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns has-medium-font-size" style="border-width:2px;border-radius:4px;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center","width":"66.66%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center" style="flex-basis:66.66%"><!-- wp:image {"id":19869,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none","align":"center","style":{"color":{"duotone":"unset"}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image aligncenter size-full"><img src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/BNM-Learning-Journey.png" alt="Learning Journey: Start, Study, Apply. (Face Questions, Find Answers, Take Action)" class="wp-image-19869"/><figcaption class="wp-element-caption">Learning Journey: Start > Study > Apply</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center","width":"33.33%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center" style="flex-basis:33.33%"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center"><strong>Learning is a continuous process.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">See our <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/faqs/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><strong>Frequently Asked Questions</strong></a> as you encounter common inquiries and hurdles on your journey. The FAQ also serves as a great starting point. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Refer to our collection of <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/resources/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><strong>Resources</strong></a> to build knowledge that enables you to overcome educational and psychological obstacles to taking action.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">If you're finding it difficult to resist the status quo forces that make complicity feel comfortable, review our <a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/survey/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><strong>Survey</strong></a> results for insight and understanding.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">As you deepen your involvement, you may find that more questions surface. This is normal and expected. Simply return to the study phase and get what you need to re-enter the application phase with confidence.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Above all, don't give up. Your voice is essential.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":19870,"width":"293px","height":"auto","sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none","align":"center","style":{"color":{"duotone":"unset"}}} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image aligncenter size-large is-resized"><img src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/261-EJ-Miller-Larson_Dont-Look-Away-663x1024.png" alt="Don't Look Away, by EJ Miller-Larson" class="wp-image-19870" style="width:293px;height:auto"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>19690</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2024-07-11 08:03:08]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-11 07:03:08]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-18 19:49:43]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-18 18:49:43]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[learn]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[page]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[burst_total_pageviews_count]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[209]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Survey]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/survey/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Jul 2024 22:55:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[melissa_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?page_id=19889</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:separator {"className":"is-style-wide","style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|30","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|30"}}},"backgroundColor":"contrast-2"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-contrast-2-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-2-background-color has-background is-style-wide" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30)"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:media-text {"align":"wide","mediaId":19675,"mediaLink":"https://www.bystandersnomore.com/survey/attachment/survey-questions_crop/","mediaType":"image","mediaWidth":47,"verticalAlignment":"center"} -->
<div class="wp-block-media-text alignwide is-stacked-on-mobile is-vertically-aligned-center" style="grid-template-columns:47% auto"><figure class="wp-block-media-text__media"><img src="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Survey-questions_crop-754x1024.png" alt="Image of BNM survey" class="wp-image-19675 size-full"/></figure><div class="wp-block-media-text__content"><!-- wp:paragraph {"placeholder":"Content"} -->
<p>In 2024, nearly 250 people completed our anonymous survey about the barriers preventing bystanders from speaking up about universal human rights for Palestinians.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:media-text -->

<!-- wp:separator {"backgroundColor":"contrast-2"} -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-text-color has-contrast-2-color has-alpha-channel-opacity has-contrast-2-background-color has-background"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">We discovered that the 3 biggest obstacles to taking action are fear of not knowing enough, fear of being called antisemitic, and feeling helpless against unresponsive power holders and structures.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"backgroundColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-custom-colour-1-background-color has-background wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/BNM-Report-Summary_26-June_v2.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Report Summary</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"14px"} -->
<div style="height:14px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">By moving citizens of conscience step by step from bystanding to showing solidarity with Palestinians, we can better collectively shift the positions of politicians and mainstream media.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"backgroundColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-custom-colour-1-background-color has-background wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/BNM-Report-Full_26-June_v2_compressed.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Full Report</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"14px"} -->
<div style="height:14px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">In the summer of 2024, Bystanders No More hosted a deep dive on our survey methodology and results with Freedom Advocacy Network. The presentation slides are now available to the public.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons"><!-- wp:button {"backgroundColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-custom-colour-1-background-color has-background wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/BNM-survey-slides.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Survey Slides</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:quote {"className":"is-style-default"} -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote is-style-default"><!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|contrast-2"}}}},"textColor":"contrast-2"} -->
<p class="has-contrast-2-color has-text-color has-link-color">I realized my silence was part of the problem. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><cite>- Survey respondent</cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
														<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[burst_total_pageviews_count]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[110]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_page_template]]></wp:meta_key>
