					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Russell tag and form test]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=19968</link>
		<pubDate></pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[russell_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=19968</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:group {"metadata":{"name":"Research links"},"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|40","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|40","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}},"color":{"background":"#eeeeee"}},"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-background" style="background-color:#eeeeee;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","fontSize":"x-large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading alignwide has-x-large-font-size">Get involved</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"30px"} -->
<div style="height:30px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:columns {"metadata":{"name":"Cards"},"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|50","left":"var:preset|spacing|10"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"},"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide" style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0"><!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"Card 1: Research - survey"},"style":{"shadow":"var:preset|shadow|natural"},"backgroundColor":"base"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-base-background-color has-background" style="box-shadow:var(--wp--preset--shadow--natural)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:html -->
          <div class="slide swiper-slide">
            <img src="images/img1.jpg" alt="" class="image" />
            <p>
              Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Aperiam,
              saepe provident dolorem a quaerat quo error facere nihil deleniti
              eligendi ipsum adipisci, fugit, architecto amet asperiores
              doloremque deserunt eum nemo.
            </p>

            <i class="bx bxs-quote-alt-left quote-icon"></i>

            <div class="details">
              <span class="name">Marnie Lotter</span>
              <span class="job">Web Developer</span>
            </div>
          </div>
<!-- /wp:html -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"layout":{"type":"flex","verticalAlignment":"bottom","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","backgroundColor":"contrast","textColor":"base","width":75,"className":"is-style-fill","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"border":{"width":"4px","color":"#e9e9e9"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 is-style-fill"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-base-color has-contrast-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color has-border-color has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/survey/" style="border-color:#e9e9e9;border-width:4px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)">Our research</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"Card 2: Summary report"},"style":{"shadow":"var:preset|shadow|natural"},"backgroundColor":"base"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-base-background-color has-background" style="box-shadow:var(--wp--preset--shadow--natural)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|30","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);margin-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">We discovered that people find their public voice when the <strong>enablers</strong> of speaking up outweigh the&nbsp;<strong>barriers</strong> that they encounter.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","backgroundColor":"contrast","textColor":"base","width":75,"className":"is-style-outline","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"border":{"color":"#e9e9e9","width":"4px"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-base-color has-contrast-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color has-border-color has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/BNM-Report-Summary_26-June_v2.pdf" style="border-color:#e9e9e9;border-width:4px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)">Summary report</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"Card 3: Full report"},"style":{"shadow":"var:preset|shadow|natural"},"backgroundColor":"base"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-base-background-color has-background" style="box-shadow:var(--wp--preset--shadow--natural)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|30","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|20","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);margin-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);margin-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">By moving from bystanders to advocates, we can take action collectively to shift the views of politicians and mainstream media.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","backgroundColor":"contrast","textColor":"base","width":75,"className":"is-style-outline","style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"border":{"color":"#e9e9e9","width":"4px"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}}} -->

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="wp_template_part_area" nicename="header"><![CDATA[header]]></category>
		<category domain="wp_theme" nicename="twentytwentyfour"><![CDATA[twentytwentyfour]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[origin]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[theme]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[origin]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[theme]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Footer]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/footer/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 10 May 2024 07:35:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Vanessa_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/footer/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:group {"style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|20","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|20"}}},"backgroundColor":"base-2","layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group has-base-2-background-color has-background" style="padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20)"><!-- wp:columns {"align":"wide"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide"><!-- wp:column {"verticalAlignment":"center","width":"100%"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center" style="flex-basis:100%"><!-- wp:group {"style":{"dimensions":{"minHeight":""},"layout":{"selfStretch":"fit","flexSize":null}},"layout":{"type":"flex","orientation":"vertical","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><!-- wp:site-title {"level":0,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"600","textTransform":"uppercase","letterSpacing":"1px"}},"fontSize":"small"} /-->

<!-- wp:social-links {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"}} -->
<ul class="wp-block-social-links"><!-- wp:social-link {"url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/bystandersnomore","service":"linkedin"} /--></ul>
<!-- /wp:social-links -->

<!-- wp:site-logo {"width":100,"shouldSyncIcon":false,"style":{"layout":{"selfStretch":"fit","flexSize":null}}} /-->

<!-- wp:site-tagline {"fontSize":"small"} /--></div>
<!-- /wp:group --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Blog Home]]></title>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[Displays the latest posts as either the site homepage or as the "Posts page" as defined under reading settings. If it exists, the Front Page template overrides this template when posts are shown on the homepage.]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>19403</wp:post_id>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Speak up for change!]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/resources/speak-up-for-change/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 27 Jun 2024 09:15:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[eller_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=19612</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color">It is hard to see the purpose of speaking out when no one seems to be listening but there is strength in numbers and we must continue to grow ours.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size"><em><em>&nbsp;"Many of us like to ask ourselves, What would I do if I was alive during slavery? Or the Jim Crow South? Or Apartheid? What would I do if my country was committing genocide? The answer is, youre doing it. Right now."</em></em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><cite><a href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-68405119">Aaron Bushnells</a> last words to the world</cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}},"typography":{"fontSize":"1.2rem"}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color" style="font-size:1.2rem">Change is coming.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">The reporting coming out of Gaza and the West Bank is harrowing. The world is speaking out against this horror with protests, marches, vigils, sit-ins, rulings and resignations; thousands of words are being written and spoken everyday with one single message: enough.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">On 26 Janaury, 2024, The International Court of Justice <a href="https://www.icj-cij.org/sites/default/files/case-related/192/192-20240126-ord-01-00-en.pdf">ruled</a> (142) that Israel may be committing genocide in Gaza and voted (15-1) to <a href="https://www.icj-cij.org/sites/default/files/case-related/192/192-20240328-pre-01-00-en.pdf">call</a> on Israel not to deny Palestinians rights protected under the Genocide Convention.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">On 25 February, 2024, Aaron Bushnell, an active-duty member of the US Air Force, <a href="https://www.salon.com/2024/05/04/an-extreme-act-of-protest-the-long-history-of-self-immolation-as-political-statement/">burnt himself alive</a> in an extreme act of protest.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">On 1 April 2024, Israel bombed a three car <a href="https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/4/3/outrage-grows-over-israels-deadly-attack-on-gaza-aid-convoy">aid convoy</a> belonging to the <a href="https://wck.org/">World Central Kitchen</a>, a food relief non-profit, killing 7 international aid workers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">On 20 May 2024 came the <a href="https://www.icc-cpi.int/news/statement-icc-prosecutor-karim-aa-khan-kc-applications-arrest-warrants-situation-state">announcement</a> that ICC Prosecutor Karim Khan had requested arrest warrants for Israels Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Defence Minister Yoav Gallant (as well as the leaders of the Hamas attacks on October 7, 2023) on charges of crimes against humanity in the Gaza Strip.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Yet the bombs continue to fall and Palestinians continue to die in Gaza and the West Bank. Despite Israels brutal and continued aggression, it is the protesters who are being detained and arrested, fired and suspended, shut down and pushed out. Student protests against the assault and siege of Gaza have been met with raids, arrests and violence across the <a href="https://www.democracynow.org/2024/5/3/state_dept">US</a> and <a href="https://www.euronews.com/my-europe/2024/05/07/police-break-up-pro-palestine-university-protests-in-europe-after-israel-rejects-ceasefire">Europe</a> including <a href="https://www.newarab.com/analysis/how-france-cracking-down-solidarity-palestine">France</a> and <a href="https://www.voanews.com/a/police-break-up-pro-palestinian-student-protest-in-berlin-as-demonstrations-spread-across-europe/7601207.html">Germany</a>. In Israel, dissent is fraught with danger - protesters are attacked, assaulted and arrested - and few dare to <a href="https://jacobin.com/2023/11/israel-cracking-down-internal-dissent-gaza-idf-benjamin-netanyahu">report</a> on it for fear of reprisal.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">The rules of warfare and international law&nbsp; have been suspended with Israel allowed to pound Gaza with the active support of the wests most powerful governments and seemingly tacit acceptance from its Middle Eastern neighbours. And yet, when asked if the protests had forced him to reconsider his administrations policies towards the region, President Biden said <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/joe-biden/biden-speak-campus-protests-days-silence-rcna150432">No</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Change, as renowned scholar and activist, <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ELNr_ro97MI">Norman Finkelstein reminds us</a>, begets change. Raising our voices is only the first, but a very important, step. The violence hasnt ended and Palestine is a long way away from being free. But every voice, every protest, every action emboldens another. The rhetoric, <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jcQVj4wAsqI">as Phyllis Bennis put it</a>, is changing: the use of the word Genocide has been normalized in reference to what Israel is doing; the ICJ ruling has become a tool citizens can hold up to their governments to force them to act.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Following <a href="https://apnews.com/article/israel-palestinians-aid-workers-killed-2d08786a9839dfc402632c7ca745acca">Israels airstrikes</a> on the food aid convoy, over three dozen congressional Democrats <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2024/apr/05/biden-israel-gaza-aid">petitioned</a> the US government to halt weapon transfers to Israel. Nine government officials have resigned over the US governments handling of the Palestinian cause. Politicians may pretend to be relaxed about losing votes of Muslims, left wing Jews and youth but the reality is that they are also losing the votes of <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/article/2024/may/12/labour-could-lose-a-wide-range-of-voters-over-gaza-not-just-muslim-ones">many who are neither Muslim nor left, but react with horror and disgust to the spectacle of a civilised, articulate people reduced to clustering around tiny body bags and moving from one rubble heap to another to escape merciless bombardment.</a>&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">The road to changing policies and perspectives, quite like the road to changing hearts and minds, is a long and difficult one. We are living through tragic times but as Angela Davis <a href="https://www.aljazeera.com/program/upfront/2023/10/27/angela-davis-palestine-is-a-moral-litmus-test-for-the-world">reminds us</a>, <em>we have to believe that it is possible to make change, we cant give up. We cant not hope because hope is the condition of all struggles</em>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Real change has yet to happen. The sound and fury of our voices will one day signify something momentous. As it did not so long ago, the end of Apartheid in South Africa, the emancipation of women, and the end of imperialism and of slavery.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>19612</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2024-06-27 10:15:42]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2024-06-27 09:15:42]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-11 08:47:18]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-11 07:47:18]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[speak-up-for-change]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="resources"><![CDATA[Resources]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_edit_last]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[5]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_wp_page_template]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[burst_total_pageviews_count]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[11]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[What do you need to know to call for an end to the slaughter in Gaza?]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/resources/what-do-you-need-to-know-to-call-for-an-end-to-the-slaughter-in-gaza/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:39:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[eller_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=19696</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color">Calling for a ceasefire in Gaza is a moral imperative.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Genocide is the crime of crimes. It is not a political issue. It is a moral issue. Defying genocide and rejecting all complicity with those who commit genocide is a moral imperative.  It is about standing, no matter the cost, with the oppressed  for if justice perishes, human life on Earth has lost its meaning. And this is our task, to fight, no matter the cost, for justice. To fight, no matter the cost, for the sacred. To fight, no matter the cost, for life.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><cite><a href="https://chrishedges.substack.com/p/the-algebra-of-genocide">Chris Hedges</a>, Pulitzer Prize winning New York Times correspondent</cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">If you dont feel comfortable calling this an unfolding genocide, then call it what you think is right. Genocidal war crimes or mass killings. But whatever the phrase you use, dont hide from the fact that Palestinians have been fighting for their right to self-determination, for equality and for justice, for over 75 years. So much has happened that naturally many of us feel we simply dont know enough about this cause to speak out or take sides.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Indeed, you might have noticed that we used the word cause in the sentence above, not conflict or war - both of which are commonly used in mainstream media. That is because whats happening in Gaza (and away from the spotlight, in the West Bank) is not a fight between equals. It is the struggle of an oppressed people <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/posts/doaa-abou-hussein-340b9293_a-few-days-ago-a-well-meaning-person-said-activity-7133224289339641856-ySlM?utm_source=share&amp;utm_medium=member_desktop">for freedom, for belonging, for life</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Palestine is a classic case of settler-colonialism dating back to 1882 and the Palestinians have been suffering the terror and the trauma of ethnic cleansing ever since.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">There is no parallel in recent history for what Robert Pape, a US military historian at the University of Chicago <a href="https://apnews.com/article/israel-gaza-bombs-destruction-death-toll-scope-419488c511f83c85baea22458472a796">describes</a> as one of the most intense civilian punishment campaigns in history  it now sits <strong>comfortably</strong> in the top quartile of the most devastating bombing campaigns ever.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">According to the Geneva-based human rights monitor, Euro-Med, in the six months leading up to April 2024, Israel had dropped <a href="https://euromedmonitor.org/en">more than 70,000 tons of explosives on the Gaza Strip</a>. Officials report in public that 37,000 humans - mostly women and children - are dead, and most of Gaza has been incinerated. In reality <a href="https://archive.is/RFONu">the numbers of dead are likely to be at least 2-3 times as many</a>. And many more will die from <a href="https://lareviewofbooks.org/article/hunger-time/">starvation and the destruction of basic sanitation</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Thousands more have been bombed, displaced, and starved in Gaza since Arundathi Roy called on governments to <a href="https://hammerandhope.org/article/arundhati-roy-palestine-gaza">Stop the Slaughter</a> in December 2023. Many more are dying in the West Bank, an Occupied Territory that Hamas does not govern. Calling for an end to the bombing and starvation of Palestinians in Gaza and hundreds of murders of Palestinians in the Occupied Territories is an act of compassion and shared humanity.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Roy said it best:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Please  for the sake of Palestine and Israel, for the sake of the living and in the name of the dead, for the sake of the hostages being held by Hamas and the Palestinians in Israels prisons, for the sake of all of humanity  stop this slaughter.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Thats all we need to know.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>19696</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2024-07-11 08:39:42]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-11 07:39:42]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-11 08:40:14]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-11 07:40:14]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[what-do-you-need-to-know-to-call-for-an-end-to-the-slaughter-in-gaza]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="resources"><![CDATA[Resources]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[burst_total_pageviews_count]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[10]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[What is the Israel Lobby and what influence does it have?]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/resources/what-is-the-israel-lobby-and-what-influence-does-it-have/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 11 Jul 2024 07:49:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[eller_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=19703</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color">Pro-Israel organizations shape UK-US foreign policy</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">The idea that an Israeli Lobby exists is not new. Indeed, the American Israel Public Affairs Committee (AIPAC) describes itself as <em><a href="https://www.aipac.org/policy">Americas pro-Israel lobby</a></em>. Established in 1960, AIPAC monitors issues ranging from strengthening the US-Israel relationship to opposing anti-Israel discrimination.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">The Lobby works not simply by funding and campaigning on behalf of Israels interests but also by informing the discourse and supporting pro-Israel organisations. AIPACs 3 million pro-Israel members for example work to <em>strengthen bipartisan support for the US-Israel relationship.</em> According to its <a href="https://www.aipacpac.org/">website</a>, <em>AIPAC supported 365 pro-Israel Democratic and Republicn candidates in 2022 with more than $17 million in direct support through AIPAC. In 2024, every single AIPAC endorsed candidate won</em>. Rather brazenly it adds that <em>it Is now the biggest source of Republican money flowing into competitive Democratic primaries this year</em>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Yet the merest suggestion that Israel might be influencing the affairs of government in the US and indeed the UK <em><a href="https://foreignpolicy.com/2019/02/15/how-and-how-not-to-talk-about-the-israel-lobby/">remains a third rail that one touches at ones peril</a>.</em> In the UK, Faiza Shaheen, until recently a Labour Party Parliamentary Candidate was deselected for <a href="https://www.newarab.com/news/uk-labour-replaces-faiza-shaheen-member-pro-israel-jlm">liking tweets critical of Israel and its influence</a> and was replaced by Shama Tatler, a member of the pro-Israel Jewish Labour Movement. In the US, Congressman Jamaal Bowman (D-NY), <a href="https://www.vox.com/politics/356515/jamaal-bowman-george-latimer-new-york-primary">lost</a> his seat to a pro-Israel opponent George Latimer. Mr Latimer was recruited by local Israelis who were unhappy with Mr Bowmans criticism of Israel and his calls for a ceasefire. AIPAC spent over <a href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/cz99x0w65dyo">12m</a> in support of his campaign and along with some other Republican mega donors, plans to <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/article/2024/jun/26/jamaal-bowman-primary-progressives-aipac">spend another $100m</a> ousting other - mainly POC - Democratic Members of Congress.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">In 2006, John J. Mearsheimer and Stephen M.Walt, two American political scientists, <a href="https://www.hks.harvard.edu/publications/israel-lobby-and-us-foreign-policy">published</a> a paper analysing how US foreign policy came to be defined by the relationship between the US and Israel and used the the phrase Israeli Lobby as shorthand for the loose coalition of individuals and organisations [not all of whom were Jews or Jewish] who actively work to shape US foreign policy in a proIsrael direction. Despite relentless and continuing criticism, they <a href="https://youtu.be/taXIbXYt6YY?si=9QJLiHkvJe32EmHj">continue</a> to make their case.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">In 2020, Israeli filmmakers produced a documentary, <em>Til Kingdom Come</em> which showed the rising influence of a hyperpartisan, hyper Republican group of evangelical Christians in the Israel Lobby. This is borne out by the existence of <a href="https://cufi.org/">Christians United for Israel</a>. With ten million members, it is the largest pro-Israel organisation in the US and its mission, quoted verbatim below tells you everything you need to know about the existence and influence of an Israel Lobby:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size"><em>Christians United for Israel (CUFI) is the foremost Christian organisation educating and empowering millions of Americans to speak and act with one voice in defence of Israel and the Jewish people. CUFIs diversity across political, ethnic, generational and denominational lines maximises our impact in communities, in the media, on campus, and in our nations capital. CUFI is committed to confronting indifference and combating antisemitism in all its forms wherever it may be found.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">In the UK, <a href="https://cfoi.co.uk/">Conservative Friends of Israel</a> (CFI) and <a href="https://www.cfi.org.uk/who-we-are">Christian Friends of Israel </a>are two very well networked advocacy organisations. CFI <a href="https://www.declassifieduk.org/pro-israel-lobby-group-paid-for-uk-foreign-and-home-secretaries-first-trips-as-mps/">paid</a> for James Cleverly and Suella Braverman, both senior members of the British government, to visit Israel three months after they were elected to Parliament. It claims 80% of conservative MPs as members and has <a href="https://www.declassifieduk.org/pro-israel-lobby-group-paid-for-uk-foreign-and-home-secretaries-first-trips-as-mps/">access to the highest levels of Israels political, military and intelligence establishment</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">The Lobbys influence with the Labour party is equally strong. According to a report by <a href="https://www.declassifieduk.org/labour-mps-have-accepted-over-280000-from-israel-lobby/">Declassified UK</a> (Feb 2024), 41 MPs are known to have accepted approximately 280,000 from the Israel lobby while groups connected to the lobby have funded over 50 Labour MPs visits to Israel since 1999. One of the funders, <a href="https://www.lfi.org.uk/about/">Labour Friends of Israel</a> (LFI) describes itself as a <em>Westminster based lobby group working with the British Labour Party to promote the State of Israel.</em> In January 2024, amidst an ongoing genocide, LFI took Labour MPs Christian Wakeford and Margaret Hodge to Israel as part of a solidarity mission. Its sources of funding are unknown <a href="https://www.declassifieduk.org/who-funds-labour-friends-of-israel-and-why-wont-it-say/">but it is believed to be closely associated with the state of Israe</a>l.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">In the <a href="https://www.declassifieduk.org/former-british-minister-the-israelis-think-they-control-the-foreign-office-and-they-do/">words</a> of Sir Alan Duncan, the Conservative UK foreign minister from 2016 to 2019, <em>Israel thinks it controls the [UK] Foreign Office. And it does!</em> <a href="https://www.politico.eu/article/israel-hamas-war-palestine-hurt-global-support-uk-defense-ben-wallace/">According to UKs former Defense Secretary Ben Wallace, Israels crude and indiscriminate approach risks fueling decades of conflict in the Middle East.</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Its noteworthy that both politicians are not in office.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>19703</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2024-07-11 08:49:59]]></wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-11 07:49:59]]></wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2024-07-11 08:49:59]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2024-07-11 07:49:59]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[closed]]></wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status><![CDATA[]]></wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name><![CDATA[what-is-the-israel-lobby-and-what-influence-does-it-have]]></wp:post_name>
		<wp:status><![CDATA[publish]]></wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type><![CDATA[post]]></wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password><![CDATA[]]></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
										<category domain="category" nicename="resources"><![CDATA[Resources]]></category>
						<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[burst_total_pageviews_count]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[25]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[3 cards - just in case needed]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/3-cards-just-in-case-needed/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 12 Jul 2024 12:31:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[elena_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/3-cards-just-in-case-needed/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:group {"metadata":{"name":"Research links"},"align":"full","style":{"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|40","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|40","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}},"color":{"background":"#eeeeee"}},"layout":{"type":"constrained"}} -->
<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-background" style="background-color:#eeeeee;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);padding-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"align":"wide","fontSize":"x-large"} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading alignwide has-x-large-font-size">Get involved</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"30px"} -->
<div style="height:30px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:columns {"metadata":{"name":"Cards"},"align":"wide","style":{"spacing":{"blockGap":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|50","left":"var:preset|spacing|10"},"margin":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"},"padding":{"top":"0","bottom":"0"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide" style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0"><!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"Card 1: Research - survey"},"style":{"shadow":"var:preset|shadow|natural"},"backgroundColor":"base"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-base-background-color has-background" style="box-shadow:var(--wp--preset--shadow--natural)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|30","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|20","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);margin-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);margin-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">In 2024, a total of 248 people completed a survey to help us better understand whether and why people speak up for Palestinian rights.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","verticalAlignment":"bottom","justifyContent":"center"},"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","backgroundColor":"contrast","textColor":"base","width":75,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"border":{"width":"4px","color":"#e9e9e9"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"className":"is-style-fill"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 is-style-fill"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-base-color has-contrast-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color has-border-color has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/survey/" style="border-color:#e9e9e9;border-width:4px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)">Our research</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"Card 2: Summary report"},"style":{"shadow":"var:preset|shadow|natural"},"backgroundColor":"base"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-base-background-color has-background" style="box-shadow:var(--wp--preset--shadow--natural)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|30","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);margin-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">We discovered that people find their public voice when the <strong>enablers</strong> of speaking up outweigh the&nbsp;<strong>barriers</strong> that they encounter.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"},"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","backgroundColor":"contrast","textColor":"base","width":75,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"border":{"color":"#e9e9e9","width":"4px"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-base-color has-contrast-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color has-border-color has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/BNM-Report-Summary_26-June_v2.pdf" style="border-color:#e9e9e9;border-width:4px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)">Summary report</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column {"metadata":{"name":"Card 3: Full report"},"style":{"shadow":"var:preset|shadow|natural"},"backgroundColor":"base"} -->
<div class="wp-block-column has-base-background-color has-background" style="box-shadow:var(--wp--preset--shadow--natural)"><!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|30","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|20","left":"var:preset|spacing|40","right":"var:preset|spacing|40"}}},"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--30);margin-right:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--20);margin-left:var(--wp--preset--spacing--40)">By moving from bystanders to advocates, we can take action collectively to shift the views of politicians and mainstream media.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:buttons {"layout":{"type":"flex","justifyContent":"center"},"style":{"spacing":{"margin":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}}} -->
<div class="wp-block-buttons" style="margin-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);margin-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)"><!-- wp:button {"textAlign":"center","backgroundColor":"contrast","textColor":"base","width":75,"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|base"}}},"border":{"color":"#e9e9e9","width":"4px"},"spacing":{"padding":{"top":"var:preset|spacing|10","bottom":"var:preset|spacing|10"}}},"className":"is-style-outline"} -->
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-75 is-style-outline"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-base-color has-contrast-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color has-border-color has-text-align-center wp-element-button" href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/BNM-Report-Full_26-June_v2_compressed.pdf" style="border-color:#e9e9e9;border-width:4px;padding-top:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10);padding-bottom:var(--wp--preset--spacing--10)">Full report</a></div>
<!-- /wp:button --></div>
<!-- /wp:buttons -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"50px"} -->
<div style="height:50px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:spacer {"height":"10px"} -->
<div style="height:10px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer --></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>19775</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date><![CDATA[2024-07-12 13:31:12]]></wp:post_date>

		</wp:postmeta>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[tss_item_fields]]></wp:meta_key>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[social_share_items]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How Can I Lobby Elected Representatives?]]></title>
		<link>https://www.bystandersnomore.com/uncategorized/how-can-i-lobby-elected-representatives/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 14 Aug 2024 19:26:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[raj_bsnm]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.bystandersnomore.com/?p=19976</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"elements":{"link":{"color":{"text":"var:preset|color|custom-colour-1"}}}},"textColor":"custom-colour-1","fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-custom-colour-1-color has-text-color has-link-color has-medium-font-size"><em>Every country is different so you may need to adapt these  guidelines for your situation. If you have comments or suggestions, </em><a href="https://www.bystandersnomore.com/contact-us/"><em>please let us know</em></a><em>.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">1) <strong>Research their statements</strong>. Check their social media accounts and parliamentary/government records and see if an established Palestinian solidarity group in your country can give you a summary of your elected representatives position.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">2) <strong>Decide if your elected representative is, in fact, your best target.</strong> If they are very ideologically aligned with the Israel Lobby, consider alternative targets for letter writing (government ministers, media executives, local decision-makers).</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">3) <strong>Be clear about your agenda.</strong> Keep your communication short. There are 4 main options and dont mix n match!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">a) Inform them about new developments and <strong>ask a specific question</strong> which their research assistant will have to research/ think about. For example, the recent ICJ ruling on Israel (do they support it, and if yes, what do they want their government to do in response or if no, why).</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">b) <strong>Engage them on one aspect</strong> of the debate that you feel confident about. Disagreement is quite likely but they may be worried enough to tell the party elites that "well informed constituents are giving me a hard time, so please do better". Of course this will happen in private, so you will never know and it also depends on other constituents doing this. Choosing one topic for each email/letter is a good way to sustain a dialogue.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">c) <strong>Tell them plainly they will lose your vote</strong> unless they do ___. Remind them why they should care (opinion polls, etc). This letter works best if lots of constituents do something similar - either independently or a joint letter - and if your elected representative is at risk at the next election. The 'asks' need to be chosen carefully. The less asks, the better - keep it focused.&nbsp; Choose asks that are plausible, citing when possible other respected governments that have taken this action.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">d) Set a hurdle so high or use language that they are likely to ignore your communication.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">There is no "right" approach - it depends on your intent. If you intend to do (d) don't waste a lot of time on it since it will only matter if many voters/donors do the same.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">If you are going to do (a)-(c), it's always useful to find something at the start to say thanks for/congratulate them on and ideally, call their office or ask for an appointment to talk in person. This shows that you really care.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"fontSize":"medium"} -->
<p class="has-medium-font-size">Finally, the Israel Lobby is very effective at this kind of organising - getting many constituents to engage persistently with elected representatives. If we want to see progress, we also need to get equally good at this set of skills.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
